item.title: 🐹 glidea/zenfeed (292 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: glidea

📝 Repository: glidea/zenfeed

📄 Descrizione: Zenfeed is a highly customizable intelligent information assistant that utilizes AI to collect, process (e.g., summarize, filter, search), and distribute personalized content from trusted data sources like RSS, aiming to help users efficiently manage information streams and reduce information anxiety.

⭐ Stelle: 292

🍴 Forks: 20

💻 Linguaggio: Go

📜 Licenza: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0
